title: Leaver Buster
body: Me and my friend were playing but earlier he had to go due to internet drop. he got given the leaver buster and now we both have waited 5 minutes for it, didnt press leave queue or anything and it restarts everytime. weve sat here for the 3rd time now?

replies.body: There is currently an issue where some PC's can get out of sync with the client and server, causing the Leaverbuster time penalties to loop. There is a fix coming for this, but if it happens again for anyone we recommend restarting your machine, and opening nothing but LoL. Then wait through the time penalty and it should stay in sync with the server.
